de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.framework.wholesaler.api.bo
Class BOPurchasePrice

java.lang.Object
  de.htwg_konstanz.ebus.framework.wholesaler.api.bo.BOPurchasePrice
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBOPrice
public class BOPurchasePrice
extends java.lang.Object
implements IBOPrice

The business object BOPurchasePrice represents a purchase price entity with it's common attributes like amount, priceType, taxRate or country.

The following example code shows how to create and persists an purchase price entity. 

 // a price object has a relation to a product. 
 // so, first of all load the product.
 BOProduct product = ProductBOA.getInstance().findByMaterialNumber(TEST_PRODUCT_MATERIAL_NUMBER);
 if(product == null)
 {       
        // do something...
        // e.g. leave the procedure or throw an exception...
 }
 
 // load the country
 BOCountry country = CountryBOA.getInstance().findCountry(Constants.DEFAULT_COUNTRY_ISO_CODE);
 if(country == null)
 {       
        // do something...
        // e.g. leave the procedure or throw an exception...
 }
 
 // create a purchase price
 BOPurchasePrice purchasePrice = new BOPurchasePrice(TEST_PRODUCT_PURCHASE_PRICE_AMOUNT, 
                                                       TEST_PRODUCT_PURCHASE_PRICE_TAXRATE, 
                                                       TEST_PRODUCT_PURCHASE_PRICE_TYPE);
 purchasePrice.setProduct(product);
 purchasePrice.setCountry(country);
 purchasePrice.setLowerboundScaledprice(Constants.DEFAULT_LOWERBOUND_SCALED_PRICE);
 PriceBOA.getInstance().saveOrUpdatePurchasePrice(purchasePrice);

Author:
tdi
